div.t-att-class: 'o_wetrack_js_reminder btn d-flex align-items-center justify-content-between rounded %s %s' % ( 'o_wetrack_reminder_light' if reminder_light else '', 'o_wetrack_reminder_small' if reminder_small else '')

span.t-att-class: 'o_wetrack_js_reminder_text text-white text-left mr-1 %s' % ('small d-sm-inline' if reminder_small else '')

t.t-esc: 'Set Reminder' if not track.is_reminder_on else 'Reminder On'

i.t-att-class: 'fa fa-bell%s inactive_color_%s' % ('' if track.is_reminder_on else '-o', 'dark' if reminder_light and not light_theme else 'light')
i.t-att-title: 'Reminder On' if track.is_reminder_on else 'Set a Reminder'
